sourcesContent:
Update Product Details

cannot be changed
* Product Type is required * Product Type must be in Alphabets
* Product Name cannot be Empty
* Category cannot be Empty * Product Category must be in Alphabets
* Rating is required * Rating is between zero to 5 * Rating is between zero to 5
* Review must be filled
* Image is required
* Price is required * Minimum price of the product must be greater than 10
* Description is required
* Specification id required
